post:
Hello there,

This is our first offer thread on LET. So, without any delay, here goes the deal:

Standard Plan:

2 GB RAM

100 GB HDD (RAID 1)

2 Cores

100 Mbit/s bandwidth (Unmetered)

Location: France (OVH) 

DDoS Protected.

KVM Virtualization.

1 x IPv4.

IPv6 will be available shortly.

All of these only for $5.50 per month (Paypal only)

You can also use your own ISO. For that, please open up a ticket, and we we will assist you with getting your own ISO up and running.

Order Link: https://blazingservers.net/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=1

Node Details:

Intel Xeon E3 v2

32 GB DDR3 RAM

Gbit Ethernet

We are also available on Skype with the ID blazingservers.

P.S.: Please excuse us if this post looks unattractive or anything is missing, as this is our first offer post, and we would try to rectify our mistakes if any from the next sale.
